description: This file defines API endpoints for agent operations related to interviews and medical advice, using FastAPI to set up routes, handle requests, and invoke corresponding orchestrator service methods.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] agent_interview_step(interview_id: str = Query(..., description="Interview ID"))
methods.description: API endpoint to trigger an interview step based on interview ID.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] agent_advisor_run( interview_id: str = Query(..., description="Interview ID"), max_items: int = Query(3, ge=1, le=10) )
methods.description: API endpoint to trigger the medical advisor agent with a given interview ID and max items.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] crew_run( interview_id: str = Query(..., description="Interview ID"), max_items: int = Query(3, ge=1, le=10) )
methods.description: API endpoint to execute a sequential workflow, running interview step followed by advisor.

ctags.name: agent_advisor_run
ctags.signature: ( interview_id: str = Query(..., description="Interview ID"), max_items: int = Query(3, ge=1, le=10) )

ctags.name: agent_interview_step
ctags.pattern: /^async def agent_interview_step(interview_id: str = Query(..., description="Interview ID")) -> Di/

ctags.name: crew_run
ctags.signature: ( interview_id: str = Query(..., description="Interview ID"), max_items: int = Query(3, ge=1, le=10) )
